trans-unit.source: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2022-12-06T17:32:01.0489626+01:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="Add info on how to activate HSS service on admin console" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2022-12-13T18:41:01.4308462+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">When you in</MadCap:annotation>stall <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, a 30-day evaluation license is generated. You must request an add-on to your <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> License from Atempo and add it to your existing <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> license. See the <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2020-06-12T17:17:50.3626348+02:00" MadCap:creator="tychom" MadCap:initials="TY" MadCap:comment="Activate hyperlink" MadCap:editor="tychom" MadCap:editDate="2020-06-12T17:18:01.5349283+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="HSS.inst_EN_doc" /> for details</MadCap:annotation>.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2022-12-06T17:32:01.0489626+01:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="Add info on how to activate HSS service on admin console" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2022-12-13T18:41:01.4308462+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">When you in</MadCap:annotation>stall <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, a 30-day evaluation license is generated.

You must request an add-on to your <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> License from Atempo and add it to your existing <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> license.

See the <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2020-06-12T17:17:50.3626348+02:00" MadCap:creator="tychom" MadCap:initials="TY" MadCap:comment="Activate hyperlink" MadCap:editor="tychom" MadCap:editDate="2020-06-12T17:18:01.5349283+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="HSS.inst_EN_doc" /> for details</MadCap:annotation>.

target.mrk: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2022-12-06T17:32:01.0489626+01:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="Add info on how to activate HSS service on admin console" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2022-12-13T18:41:01.4308462+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Lors de l’installation</MadCap:annotation> du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, une licence d’évaluation de 30 jours est fournie.

Vous devez ensuite demander un supplément de licence <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> à Atempo et le rajouter à votre licence <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> existante.

Voir <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2020-06-12T17:17:50.3626348+02:00" MadCap:creator="tychom" MadCap:initials="TY" MadCap:comment="Activate hyperlink" MadCap:editor="tychom" MadCap:editDate="2020-06-12T17:18:01.5349283+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="HSS.inst_EN_doc" /> pour plus de détails</MadCap:annotation>.

trans-unit.source: Once your license file has been updated, you must declare the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> used by <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in your <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Once your license file has been updated, you must declare the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> used by <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in your <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Une fois votre fichier de licence mis à jour, vous devez déclarer le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> utilisé par <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> dans votre <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: To declare <MadCap:variable name="HSS.license_doc" /> in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" />

seg-source.mrk: To declare <MadCap:variable name="HSS.license_doc" /> in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" />

target.mrk: Déclarer <MadCap:variable name="HSS.license_doc" /> dans l'<MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" />

trans-unit.source: Do not perform this operation if the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> License file has not been updated with your <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> component.

seg-source.mrk: Do not perform this operation if the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> License file has not been updated with your <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> component.

target.mrk: N’effectuez-pas cette opération si la licence <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> n’a pas été mise à jour avec le composant <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Launch a web browser and enter this URL:

seg-source.mrk: Launch a web browser and enter this URL:

target.mrk: Lancez un navigateur et entrez cette URL :

trans-unit.source: http://<your_server>:8181/

seg-source.mrk: http://<your_server>:8181/

target.mrk: http://<your_server>:8181/

trans-unit.source: Connect to the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> with administrator rights (superadmin).

seg-source.mrk: Connect to the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> with administrator rights (superadmin).

target.mrk: Connectez-vous à la <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> avec des droits d'administrateur (superadmin).

trans-unit.source: Select Settings > Preferences > License.

seg-source.mrk: Select Settings > Preferences > License.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez Paramètres > Préférences > Licence.

trans-unit.source: In the License server field, enter the name of your Atempo License Manager.

seg-source.mrk: In the License server field, enter the name of your Atempo License Manager.

target.mrk: Dans le champ serveur de licences, saisissez le nom de votre Atempo License Manager.

trans-unit.source: Provide a port number only if you do not want to use a port within the default range of 27000 to 27001.

seg-source.mrk: Provide a port number only if you do not want to use a port within the default range of 27000 to 27001.

target.mrk: Saisissez un numéro de port uniquement si vous ne souhaitez pas utiliser un port dans la plage par défaut de 27000 à 27001.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a port number, <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> automatically assigns a free port number within the default range to communicate with the license server. For instance, if port 27000 is not available, port 27001 is chosen instead.

seg-source.mrk: If you do not specify a port number, <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> automatically assigns a free port number within the default range to communicate with the license server.
For instance, if port 27000 is not available, port 27001 is chosen instead.

target.mrk: Si vous ne spécifiez pas de numéro de port, <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> attribue automatiquement un numéro de port libre dans la plage par défaut pour communiquer avec le serveur de licences.
Par exemple, si le port 27000 n'est pas disponible, le port 27001 est sélectionné.

trans-unit.source: If you do specify a port number, <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> does not attempt to find the next free port available when the one specified is already used.

seg-source.mrk: If you do specify a port number, <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> does not attempt to find the next free port available when the one specified is already used.

target.mrk: Si vous spécifiez un numéro de port, <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> ne tente pas de trouver le prochain port libre disponible lorsque celui spécifié est déjà utilisé.

trans-unit.source: 6. Click Apply license configuration.

seg-source.mrk: 6. Click Apply license configuration.

target.mrk: 6. Cliquez sur Appliquer configuration de licence.

trans-unit.source: Interface parameters enable you to configure and modify the license and components<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="General.PDF" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> (<MadCap:xref href="#license_components" class="table_x">see Table</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText>.

seg-source.mrk: Interface parameters enable you to configure and modify the license and components<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="General.PDF" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> (<MadCap:xref href="#license_components" class="table_x">see Table</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText>.

target.mrk: Les paramètres d'interface vous permettent de configurer et de modifier la licence et les composants<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="General.PDF" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> (<MadCap:xref href="#license_components" class="table_x">see Table</MadCap:xref>)</MadCap:conditionalText>.

target.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Name

target.mrk: Nom

trans-unit.source: Product name, either <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HSS), <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hvvmw_hvds" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HVDS), or <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (ALN).

seg-source.mrk: Product name, either <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HSS), <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hvvmw_hvds" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HVDS), or <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (ALN).

target.mrk: Nom du produit, soit <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HSS), <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hvvmw_hvds" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (HVDS) ou <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (ALN).

target.mrk: État

trans-unit.source: Product status (e.g., Running, Disabled).

seg-source.mrk: Product status (e.g., Running, Disabled).

target.mrk: État du produit (par exemple, En cours d'exécution, Désactivé).

target.mrk: Utilisation

trans-unit.source: License status (e.g., number of agents available or token acquired).

seg-source.mrk: License status (e.g., number of agents available or token acquired).

target.mrk: Statut de la licence (par exemple, le nombre d'agents disponibles ou de jetons acquis).

seg-source.mrk: Expiration

target.mrk: Expiration

trans-unit.source: Number of days remaining before the license expires.

seg-source.mrk: Number of days remaining before the license expires.

target.mrk: Nombre de jours restants avant expiration de la licence.

trans-unit.source: Missing licenses

seg-source.mrk: Missing licenses

target.mrk: Licences manquantes

trans-unit.source: Number of agents that require a license.

seg-source.mrk: Number of agents that require a license.

target.mrk: Nombre d'agents nécessitant une licence.

trans-unit.source: License type

seg-source.mrk: License type

target.mrk: Type de licence

trans-unit.source: Possible values are evaluation, standard or MSP license:

seg-source.mrk: Possible values are evaluation, standard or MSP license:

target.mrk: Les valeurs possibles sont licence d'évaluation, standard ou MSP :

trans-unit.source: An evaluation license lasts only for 30 days and is installed by default when you install a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

seg-source.mrk: An evaluation license lasts only for 30 days and is installed by default when you install a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

target.mrk: Une licence d'évaluation ne dure que 30 jours et est installée par défaut lorsque vous installez le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: A standard license requires an <MadCap:variable name="ALN.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installed on your network. The standard license is associated with a predefined number of agents, as specified when you purchased the license. This type of license requires a license server and a license file corresponding to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: A standard license requires an <MadCap:variable name="ALN.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installed on your network.
The standard license is associated with a predefined number of agents, as specified when you purchased the license.

This type of license requires a license server and a license file corresponding to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Une licence standard nécessite une installation de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.license_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sur votre réseau.
La licence standard est associée à un nombre prédéfini d'agents, comme spécifié lors de l'achat de la licence.

Ce type de licence nécessite un serveur de licences et un fichier de licence correspondant à <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: An MSP license can be used for an unlimited number of agents. This type of license requires a license server and a license file corresponding to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: An MSP license can be used for an unlimited number of agents.

This type of license requires a license server and a license file corresponding to <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Une licence MSP peut être utilisée pour un nombre illimité d'agents.

Ce type de licence nécessite un serveur de licences et un fichier de licence correspondant à <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /><MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" MadCap:conditions="HSS.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: License Server

seg-source.mrk: License Server

target.mrk: Serveur de licences

trans-unit.source: For standard licenses only, this parameter displays the License Server name used. To apply a license configuration, provide a server name and a port, then click Apply license configuration.

seg-source.mrk: For standard licenses only, this parameter displays the License Server name used.
To apply a license configuration, provide a server name and a port, then click Apply license configuration.

target.mrk: Pour les licences standard uniquement, ce paramètre affiche le nom du serveur de licences utilisé.
Pour appliquer une configuration de licence, indiquez un nom de serveur et un port, puis cliquez sur Appliquer la configuration de licence.

trans-unit.source: Port

seg-source.mrk: Port

target.mrk: Port

trans-unit.source: License server port number.

seg-source.mrk: License server port number.

target.mrk: Numéro de port du serveur de licences
